execution_plan.description: Retrieve each order's id, order placement date, and the product ids for items in the order by joining Orders with Order_Items (all in the orders_db).
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.date_order_placed, oi.product_id FROM Orders AS o JOIN Order_Items AS oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product prices for the products referenced by the order items from the products_db. This uses the product_ids returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
